tiles.name: Shinjuku Central Block
tiles.description: A dense city block in Neo-Kyoto's Shinjuku district, characterized by concrete structures, digital billboards, and a pervasive sense of corporate control. The 'scale_chunk_description' indicates each chunk is a city block.

tiles.name: Neon Alleyway
tiles.description: A narrow alleyway bathed in neon light, featuring cybernetic shops and hidden passages. The 'features' include 'alleys', 'cybernetic_shops' and 'digital_billboards'.

tiles.name: Corporate Plaza
tiles.description: A plaza dominated by mega-corporation headquarters, showcasing steel and glass architecture. 'Terrain_types' include 'steel' and 'glass'. 'Landmarks' include 'Mega-corporation headquarters (implied presence)'.

tiles.name: Rooftop Access Point
tiles.description: A rooftop offering a vantage point over the city. A possible access point to hidden passages and black market locations. 'Terrain_types' includes 'rooftops' and 'features' includes 'hidden_passages'.

tiles.name: Whisperwind Collective HQ
tiles.description: A dilapidated karaoke bar serving as the headquarters for the Whisperwind Collective. 'Landmarks' includes 'Dilapidated karaoke bar (Whisperwind Collective HQ)' and 'features' includes 'karaoke_bar'.

tiles.name: Shinjuku Crossroads
tiles.description: A bustling intersection with constant traffic of vehicles and pedestrians, illuminated by overwhelming neon lights. 'Features' includes 'roads'.

tiles.name: Black Market Entrance
tiles.description: A seemingly unremarkable entrance leading to an underground black market. The 'landmarks' specify the presence of 'Black market locations (implied presence)'.

tiles.name: Industrial Backstreet
tiles.description: A gritty backstreet with visible signs of pollution and decay, primarily constructed of concrete and asphalt. 'Terrain_types' includes 'concrete' and 'asphalt'.

tiles.name: Skyscraper Base
tiles.description: The base of a towering skyscraper, reflecting the oppressive atmosphere of Neo-Kyoto. 'Features' include 'skyscrapers' and 'tone_and_atmosphere' is 'oppressive'.
